post.author: 이계영
post.content: Front End Web Developer – Toronto – 3 month Contract – (skills) –Must have stock, financial data and online financial reports experience and background. Required Technical Skills: HTML, HTML 5, CSS, JavaScript, JSP. 4+ years hands-on web development experience and strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, DHTML, DOM scripting and cross-browser compatibility issues. 2+ years programming experience in Java, XML, Servlet and JSP Understanding of PHP or other web programming languages Experience with JDBC, SQL and Oracle databases is an asset Experience with a Unix (Solaris) or Linux environment Excellent design skills, with the ability to transform concepts into working models and product solutions Sound knowledge of performance optimization techniques Development experience with Flash (ActionScript) Experience working with a source control system such as CVS
post.title: Front End Web Developer
